job.title: AI/ML - Machine Learning Researcher, MIND
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brWe are looking for outstanding researchers to work on ambitious artificial intelligence projects that will advance the field and shape intelligence in future Apple products As a team we are working to define and solve the hardest problems in machine learning computer vision NLP and speech recognition Our roots are in research which means at our core we value learning intellectual curiosity and explorationbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brIndepth expertise in machine learning research brbrbrDomain expertise in one or more of computer vision audio processing NLP optimization or computer graphics fieldsbrbrbrStrong mathematical background in linear algebra and statisticsbrbrbrPublication record in relevant venues eg NeurIPS ICML ICLR CVPR ICCV ECCV ACL SIGGRAPHbrbrbrProficient in Python and CC CUDA or other GPGPU is a plusbrbrbrExpertise in working with at least one deep learning framework for example PyTorch TensorFlowbrbrbrStrong interpersonal skills and ability to collaborate in a diverse environmentbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brAs a Machine Learning Researcher on this team you willbrbrbr  Work on some of the most ambitious technical problems on data and compute efficient machine learningbrbrbr  Research novel AI solutions that will impact future Apple productsbrbrbr  Collaborate with worldclass machine learning researchers and engineers to bring research ideas to production brbrbr  Publish and present your work in worldclass scientific venues in machine learning field brbrbr  Provide technical mentorship and guidancebrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brPhD in Computer Science or a related fieldbrbr brRole Number 200246707brbr
